item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...
item.dc:creator: metalmunki
item.description:
I didn’t realise it until I finished the game, but I read on some forums that apparently all red valves are useable. Any other colour is not. Is that true?

item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
I was thinking that, they should have made it so you can’t crouch the fire in that part.

Though I thought it was pretty stupid when he said the red valve looked like everything else and there was millions of objects on the floor when A. There was only 2, and B. He already had used 3 or 4 of the same red valves and they were the only valves that did anything so far.

Read full topic

item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...
item.dc:creator: SiCaRiO
item.description:
UnhingedMouse0:

Except the 2nd valve IS usable, just not at the exact moment he tried it. It’s a shut off for when the pipe explodes up top. It’s another option to just crouching under the flames. He jumps to conclusions all the time.

yeah but thats where level desing comes to play. As an example, you remmeber those red valves in nova-prospetk that extinguished fires? those were place in a way that, you first saw the fire, then the valve ( when you back tracked to look for another path). That partic ular part of the level could have been improved, but that would have required the fire to be unavoidable and/or the valve placed somewhere else.

Read full topic

item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...
item.dc:creator: Langenscheiss
item.description:
I have to admit that sometimes, it’s really frustrating to see other people complain about stuff they do not know a thing of, and if they do that in public, it’s frustrating to the point where it’s really annoying. But thats why TBs channel works. He is not afraid of fanboys, even if they are right in what they’re saying.

About platforming: It’s one reason why I like Half-Life. As a child, I loved all the jump and run games, and to some extent, I have never lost that love! I mean, is it realistic or the most intelligent way to deal with a situation? Probably not. Can it be entertaining and demanding (movement control)? I really think so. Hence, I appreciate the dev’s approach to platforming, meaning that they have not cut it out in its entirety.

Read full topic

item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...
item.dc:creator: Mental_Ninja
item.description:
Lets focus all this TB hating energy into figuring out the pizza code mystery.

Read full topic

item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
SiCaRiO:

He made a good point, trough, with the red valve thingy. Why one red valve is usualbe when the next red valve in the very next room is not? its confusing and could have been avoided easily by changing colors. Black mesa has a lot of those little “bad desings choices” that make the game a bit more confusing than what i should have been, noting gamebreaking, trough.

Except the 2nd valve IS usable, just not at the exact moment he tried it. It’s a shut off for when the pipe explodes up top. It’s another option to just crouching under the flames. He jumps to conclusions all the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...
item.dc:creator: SiCaRiO
item.description:
he didnt blamed the mod, the blamed Half life, and said specificly “half life is not a perfect game, no matter what fanbois say”, and he is right (to an extend), his dead on plataforming were ridicculus, yes, somebody who had played at least one source game knows what crouch jumping is. But the critic goes beyond that, first person plataforming is a faulty concept, witch ussually gives more headache than satisfaction. Personally I enjoy jumping puzzles, maybe because I they have grown on my thanks to the half life saga, but I can see why he thinks they are bad.

UnhingedMouse0:

TB understands game mechanics and the industry really well, yes. However, what he does not understand very well is level design. That’s why he is so bad at puzzle games, because they are so often environmentally driven and he just doesn’t understand the logic of how to properly analyze and maneuver through an environment. (As evidenced by his going around the pipes in circles for 10 minutes.) Then, in situations like this, he criticizes the games for ‘bad design’ rather than recognizing that the fault lies with him. He’s arrogant and thinks himself infallible.

He made a good point, trough, with the red valve thingy. Why one red valve is usualbe when the next red valve in the very next room is not? its confusing and could have been avoided easily by changing colors. Black mesa has a lot of those little “bad desings choices” that make the game a bit more confusing than what i should have been, noting gamebreaking, trough.

Read full topic

item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...

item.description:
The guy is no good at puzzle games, and he admits it, yet he still rages and blames the game when he dies. It was stressful watching him try to do jumping puzzles and jumping totally the wrong way, then moaning when he died and blaming the mod.

I used to be a fan, but lately I’ve come to realize how much of a whiny tool he is. Unsubscribing from him as soon as the Terraria series ends, the only reason I watch that is for Jesse Cox.

This

Read full topic

item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
Here’s what I’ve noticed over time, and this is essentially what I got blocked for saying:
TB understands game mechanics and the industry really well, yes. However, what he does not understand very well is level design. That’s why he is so bad at puzzle games, because they are so often environmentally driven and he just doesn’t understand the logic of how to properly analyze and maneuver through an environment. (As evidenced by his going around the pipes in circles for 10 minutes.) Then, in situations like this, he criticizes the games for ‘bad design’ rather than recognizing that the fault lies with him. He’s arrogant and thinks himself infallible.

I also posted about how he whined throughout the livestream about how he didn’t want to put Black Mesa on YouTube because all the HL fanboys would be bitching at him… and then what does he do, he puts in on there anyway… in a horribly edited and pointlessly censored format.

Read full topic

item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...
item.dc:creator: Cubbage_Odessa_Cubba
item.description:
I watched that stream live, and I can say that TB made some pretty good points in it. Granted, it was infuriating when he didn’t figure out how to crouch jump until the chat intervened, but still.

Basically, I think it’s what Langenscheiss said. If you hate a game as well, he’s the best guy ever, but if you disagree, he’s a lying PoS.

(Gotta agree with him on the crowbar thing, though. Really? How did that get messed up?)

item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...
item.dc:creator: Langenscheiss
item.description:
If he rants about a game one does not like either, one realizes how smart he is. If he complains about stuff you like, he is a whining douche. That’s the most normal thing in the world, being hypocratic/opportunistic, so to avoid that, I tend to ignore that guy. I don’t need TB to get angry about Call Of Duty 1000, and I don’t need him to be distracted from my love for this mod

item.title: Totalbiscuit on BlackMesa...
item.dc:creator: SiCaRiO
item.description:
UnhingedMouse0:

TotalBiscuit is such a douche. Watch out if you want to post a comment on that video… I and a bunch of other people got blocked because our feedback was slightly negative. I used to be a fan, but lately I’ve come to realize how much of a whiny tool he is. Unsubscribing from him as soon as the Terraria series ends, the only reason I watch that is for Jesse Cox.

Oh he definitely is, but he also has very good points and usually backs every opinion he makes with evidence (im talking about Mailbox and WTF is). In this stream, however, good points are mixed with whining. You wouldnt denied that first person plataforming was a bad idea and thats why no games apart from mirros edge have it anymore, or how the corwbar animation is way worse than the original Hl2 animation, the rest is just whining for his personal retardation on the game and exagerating for comedy pruposes
